PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12552024-11-27TC
ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of GARY DROUIN of Chelsea, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and his designation as Chairperson of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, for a term of five years, effective December 18, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of GARY DROUIN of Chelsea, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and his designation as Chairperson of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, for a term of five years, effective December 18, 2024.
